TenderNotice.title: Notice Inviting e-Tender

tenderDetails.nameOfWork: Maintenance of [Details of work, currently illegible, should be inserted here]

TenderNotice.invitedFrom: Central & State Government, Public Sector Undertakings / Enterprises, and eligible Contractors / Firms / Agencies of appropriate class, registered with State PWDs / CPWD / MES Railway / P & T or other registered firms.

biddingProcess.instructions: Bidding is online only. Bidders are allowed to bid 24x7 until the closing time with the option for re-submission (latest bid considered). Physical submission is not permitted.

bidOpening.process: Bids will be opened online and will be accessible to bidders through https://eprocure.gov.in. Bidders may be present at the bid opening.

additionalInfo.corrigendumNote: Any subsequent corrigendum will be available on the website only.
